itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the protesters’ storming of the Capitol Building, the reactions from liberals and conservatives — including Joe Biden, Cori Bush, AOC, and Adam Kinzinger — plus Trump’s social media ban, what will happen now that the government is all Democrat, Air Traffic Control being hacked, Bitcoin, and Ross and Dan’s thoughts on a Danish kids’ cartoon about a man who has to overcome having a huge penis.
